name: Automatic Reptile Mister for Reptile Tank Smart Reptiles Mister System with Timer 360° Nozzles,Slient Terrarium Misting System Humidifier for Chameleons,Snakes,Frogs Smart Spray Control
short_description: NEW REPTILE MISTING SYSTEM - Hydration is necessary for reptile habitats. This is essential in helping them lay eggs, hatch them and stay healthy. Reptile humidifiers automate the process of adding moisture to terrariums. This way your pet can enjoy an environment consistent with the rainforest.

360° ROTATING NOZZLES - Reptile humidifier misting system with 2 adjustable nozzles. Support 360° rotating, can be disassembled and adjusted according to the size of different reptile terrariums. By adjusting the length of the water hose and the angle of the nozzle, you can cover any location you want to spray, so that the tropical rainforest terrarium can get sufficient moisture.

SMART TIMING SETTING - Reptile Humidifiers Misting System only 3 buttons to easy setup. Press the "Spray Duration" once to increase 5 seconds. Starting from 5s, 10s, 15s - 60s; Press the "Stop Duration" once to increase 1 hour. Starting from 1H, 2H, 3H ... 24H, so cycle.

ENJOY DIY AND CONVENIENCE - Reptile misting system is easy to install, and you can use the accessories included in the package to disassemble, assemble, and DIY to meet your needs. Compared with traditional reptile humidifiers, our humidifier does not have a water tank, you can use a large bucket as a water reservoir. Store enough water for atomization, saving you time and labor in adding water.

SCENARIO APPLICATION - Reptile humidifier misting system is mainly used in terrariums and rainforest boxs to keep reptiles such as Chameleons, Snake, Frog, Turtle, Lizard... In addition, it can also be used for plant watering, plant beautification in gardens, greenhouses and other scenes, fan cooling, etc. Whether in the garden or in a terrarium, is a great choice for Spraying/Humidifying/Cooling/Cleaning.

name: Reptile Fogger Automatic Reptile Mister Fogger for Terrarium, Timed Terrariums Humidifiers for Chameleon/Lizard/Snake/Turtle/Frog
short_description: 【High Density Atomization】Our reptile mister has two 360° adjustable nozzles, using them can add humidity to your terrarium in all directions and quickly. Note: The spray effect is water mist particles rather than mist.
【Intelligent Circulation Reptile Misting System】The Automatic spray cycle system of our reptile humidifiers allows you to take care of your reptiles during work and vacation.

【Simple Setup】Only need 3 button setting this reptile fogger. You can set 5s, 10s, 15s-60s cycle spray time, and 1h, 2h, 3h-24h cycle stop time. Our reptile misting system is not equipped with a pool, you can configure an idle pool (such as a bucket) at will.

【MYGIIKAKA Automatic Reptile Mister】Please refer to the manual for install the reptile humidifier and pay attention to the connection of the water pipe to the water inlet/outlet. When inserting the water pipe, if there is resistance, you need to insert it a little more forcefully to lock it in place. It is recommended to keep the host away from the terrarium when installing the reptile mister, to avoid affecting the reptile when the host is running.

【Product Testing】Each reptile misting system will be product tested and it may leave water droplets, please don't worry, all we offer are brand new products. If you have any questions about our reptile fogger, please feel free to contact us.

name: 2.2L Reptile Mister with 2pcs Nozzles, Solo Reptile Mister System with Timer, Automatic Mister Fogger for Reptile Tank, Adjustable Terrarium Misting Humidifier for Reptiles/Amphibians
short_description: Top Fill & Integrated Design: This reptile mister equipped with a large 2.2L water tank and top filling, integrated and visual design, no leakage during misting, water level can be observed at all times. Simulates natural rainfall which improves environmental humidity of habitat effectively, suitable for tropical rainforest reptiles and plants such as red-eyed tree frogs, chameleons, pineapples, orchids, mosses etc

Adjustable Misting & Timer/Cycle: Our reptile mister system design with 3 gear misting and timer/cycle function. Depending on the needs of the reptiles or rainforest landscapes, you can adjust the spray flow and misting time. Once the timer and misting gear set, the settings are stored in the reptile fogger automatically. There is no need to reset the timer every time you restart the power to the device

Operate Smoothly and Quietly: This automatic mister equipped with an micro-booster pump, working sound below 45db, each spray nozzle can be adjusted by 360°rotation. Come with 2pcs nozzles, you can decide the number of nozzles to use based on the size of the tank and the humidity requirements. Flow rate (with 2 nozzles): 0.10L/M

Easy to Setup & Long-lasting: Our terrarium mister is incredibly easy to setup with quick disconnects between the water hoses to the spray nozzles with suction cups. No need for cutting glass, no need for extensive knowledge of piping just plain and simple. We offer a 12 months warr-anty for this misting system, please purchase with confidence

Satisfaction Guaranteed: Each mister system undergoes strict pre-packaging testing and final AQL inspection to ensure optimum performance. Rest assured that any traces of prior use on the product are solely from quality checks, If you have any dissatisfaction or problem, we offer 24/7 customer service available year-round

short_description: PROGRAMMABLE AUTOMATION: Take control of your habitat's climate with the easy-to-set digital cycle timer. Auto cycle misting for terrariums. Perfectly simulates tropical humidity cycles for reptiles, amphibians, and tropical plants.

SUPERIOR COVERAGE WITH 2 ADJUSTABLE MISTING NOZZLES: Comes equipped with two high-output misting nozzles on flexible, repositionable tubing. Ensure complete and even coverage for small and large terrariums, screen chameleon cages, intricate paludarium tanks, and expansive frog or dart frog terrariums.

HIGH-CAPACITY & LOW-NOISE OPERATION: The system operates with a micro ultra-quiet diaphragm pump, providing consistent pressure without disturbing sensitive pets like chameleons, snakes, or arboreal frogs.

VERSATILE & MULTI-HABITAT COMPATIBILITY: Engineered for a wide range of applications. An ideal reptile humidifier for snake enclosures, a precise terrarium mister for hermit crab tanks, a crucial rain system for bioactive dart frog terrariums, and a reliable humidifier for mushroom cultivation or orchidariums.
RELIABLE & USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Built with a water filter to prevent nozzle clogs from mineral deposits.

This professional-grade reptile misting system is engineered for serious hobbyists and herpetoculture enthusiasts who demand precision, reliability, and ease of use. Whether you're maintaining delicate humidity for a chameleon, simulating rainforest conditions for tree frogs, or nurturing plants in a lush paludarium, the MistMaster Pro delivers unparalleled environmental control.

name: Reptile Mister System, External Timer & 360° Adjustable Nozzle, Humidifier for Reptiles, Amphibians, Rainforest Plants and Aquariums
short_description: 【DIY Your Rainforest System】: This reptile misting system comes with 6 adjustable 360° nozzles that create a fine mist effect to help lower the ambient temperature. The kit includes a water pump, line controller, spray heads, hose clips, and filter head, making installation easy to create your ideal humidity environment.

【Low Noise Water Pump】: The efficient small external water pump offers long service life, low energy consumption, and operates quietly (only 45dB - quieter than normal conversation). It will not disturb your pets or your rest at night, offering an advantage over internal pump designs.

【360° Adjustable Nozzles】: Equipped with 6 adjustable nozzles, this system delivers fine water mist from multiple directions, quickly increasing humidity in your aquarium. Note: The mist is made of water particles, not a light fog.

【Customizable Misting Cycle】: The external timer lets you customize the misting cycle duration (00-24 hours), with adjustable misting duration (1-59 seconds/1-9 minutes), interval time (1-23 hours/1-30 days/10-50 minutes), ensuring the misting cycle meets your needs.

【Wide Application】: This misting system is ideal for chameleons, geckos, frogs, and other reptiles and amphibians. It can also be used for aquariums, tropical plants, greenhouses, and other humidifying applications, helping you easily maintain optimal humidity for an ideal environment.

name: Exo Terra Monsoon Solo II - Programmable Misting System for Reptile Terrariums, Ultimate Humidifier with Multiple Nozzles for Optimal Humidity Control
short_description: Programmable Misting System for Terrariums & Greenhouses: Exo Terra Monsoon SOLO II offers fully customizable misting with adjustable intervals and durations to maintain optimal humidity levels. Ideal for reptiles, amphibians, and tropical plants, this misting system enhances breeding behavior and plant growth by providing a fine mist that mimics natural rain

Powerful 36.25 PSI Pump for Consistent Water Pressure: Equipped with a robust 2.5 BAR pump, this misting unit delivers reliable and consistent water pressure, ensuring an ultra-fine mist to evenly distribute moisture. The powerful misting system supports up to two nozzles, each delivering a delicate fog-like spray to keep humidity levels just right

Expandable & Flexible Spray Nozzle Design: Exo Terra Monsoon SOLO II comes with one flexible spray nozzle, easily adjustable in any direction for precise misting coverage. The system can be expanded to accommodate a second nozzle, perfect for misting multiple terrariums or providing thorough coverage in a single large enclosure

Durable, Leak-Proof Tubing & Connectors: Featuring pressure-resistant Polyether tubing and leak-proof connectors, this misting system is built to last. The high-quality construction ensures a secure and watertight setup, preventing unwanted drips and maintaining consistent performance over time

1.5 Liter Reservoir for Long-Lasting Operation: With a generous 1.5-liter reservoir, this misting unit can operate for several days without refilling, ideal for vacations or periods of extended absence. The reservoir is easy to refill without needing to disassemble the unit, providing a convenient and user-friendly experience for terrarium and greenhouse enthusiasts
product_description: The Exo Terra Monsoon Solo II is a highly advanced programmable misting system designed specifically for reptile terrariums. With its adjustable spray nozzles, this misting system provides your reptiles with the necessary water and humidity they need to thrive in their tank. Equipped with a powerful motor and precision spraying technology, the Exo Terra Monsoon Solo II creates a fine fog-like mist that evenly distributes throughout your terrarium. This helps maintain optimal humidity levels while also providing essential hydration for your reptiles. The easy-to-use programmable settings allow you to customize the frequency and duration of misting sessions, ensuring that your pets receive consistent care without any hassle or worry on your part. Keep your reptile's habitat healthy and thriving with the reliable performance of the Exo Terra Monsoon Solo II mister system.
